org.apache.james.mailbox.model

Interface MessageResultIterator

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Iterator<MessageResult>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    StoreMessageResultIterator

    public interface MessageResultIterator
extends Iterator<MessageResult>
    A special Iterator which allows to access the MailboxException if one was thrown while try to lazy fetch the MessageResult's in batches

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      MailboxException getException()
      This method should get called after the Iterator.hasNext() method returns false.

      • Methods inherited from interface java.util.Iterator

        hasNext, next, remove

    • Method Detail

      • getException

        MailboxException getException()
        This method should get called after the Iterator.hasNext() method returns false. If it does not return null an error was thrown before while try to lazy fetch th next batch of MessageResult's
        Returns:
        exception
